name: Never Fallen
description:
Welcome to Never Fallen

The Never Fallen Demo is meant to be played in one sitting. There are no save features for the game.

Follow the main character, Astrid, through the ravaged city of Narmac in order to find the legendary ruin sword. Astrid will encounter several enemies throughout her journey, it is her job to defeat them. Likewise, keep an eye out for breakable vases dangling from chains! Breaking these will help you progress though the stages. Be wary though, for Astrid only has one life. Making contact with any enemy or trap will be fatal!

_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls

Move: WASD

Shoot: Q

Jump: Space
